label: LogisticsTransportEquipment
comment: A piece of equipment used to hold, protect or secure cargo for logistics purposes.,A referenced piece of equipment used to hold, protect or secure cargo for logistics purposes.

datatypeProperties.comment: The indication of whether or not this piece of logistics transport equipment is accompanied, such as by a transport means.
A carrier assigned booking identifier for this piece of logistics transport equipment.
The characteristic or characteristics, expressed as text, of a piece of logistics transport equipment, such as its size and type.
A damage remark, expressed as text, for this piece of logistics transport equipment.
The percent of the humidity (moisture content) within this piece of logistics transport equipment.
A proprietary identifier.
Information, expressed as text, concerning the transport of these dangerous goods.
A loading remark, expressed as text, for this piece of logistics transport equipment.
The loading sequence number for this supply chain consignment.
The code specifying the characteristic or characteristics of this piece of logistics transport equipment, such as the ISO 6346 transport equipment size and type code.
The manufacturing date, time, date time, or other date time value for this logistics means of transport.
The type of power supply, expressed as text, for this piece of logistics transport equipment, such as diesel fuel or electricity.
The code specifying the type of power supply for this piece of logistics transport equipment, such as diesel fuel or electricity.
The release identifier for this piece of logistics transport equipment.
The release restriction, expressed as text, for this piece of logistics transport equipment.
The indication of whether or not this logistics package is returnable.
The indication of whether or not this associated piece of transport equipment is sealed.
A sequence number for these specified personal effects.
Shipper reference information, expressed as text, for this piece of logistics transport equipment.
The stowage position identifier for this piece of logistics transport equipment.
A code specifying a category of this piece of associated transport equipment.
The code specifying the used capacity of this piece of logistics transport equipment, such as full or empty.
The code specifying the arrangement for the haulage of this piece of logistics transport equipment.
The code specifying the legal status of this piece of logistics transport equipment with respect to a specific law such as the "Container Convention Code".
The code specifying the transport movement status for this piece of logistics transport equipment, such as for export, for import, or for transhipment.
The code specifying the operational status for this piece of logistics transport equipment, such as to be repaired or to be shifted.
The code specifying the characteristics, i.e. size and type, of this piece of associated transport equipment.
The code specifying the role of the party responsible for supplying this piece of logistics transport equipment, such as the carrier or the buyer.
The sequence number differentiating this piece of logistics transport equipment from others during unloading.

objectProperties.comment: An actual route for this piece of logistics transport equipment.
Additional instructions for this piece of logistics transport equipment.
A logistics seal affixed to this piece of associated transport equipment.
The measure of the air flow for this piece of logistics transport equipment.
A note providing information applicable to this piece of logistics transport equipment.
A logistics service charge applicable to this supply chain consignment item.
A document associated with this line trade settlement.
Transport equipment attached to this piece of logistics transport equipment, such as ropes or refrigeration units.
An IOT device attached to this logistics transport means.
A bonded warehouse storage event for this supply chain consignment.
A piece of transport equipment carried on this piece of logistics transport equipment, such as a container placed on a rail wagon.
A carrier party for this line trade agreement.
A consolidation event specifying when and where this piece of logistics transport equipment will be, or has been, stuffed.
A consignment contained in this piece of logistics transport equipment.
The number of consignments contained in this piece of logistics transport equipment.
A piece of transport equipment contained within this piece of logistics transport equipment, such as a pallet.
A deconsolidation event for this piece of logistics transport equipment.
Delivery instructions for this piece of logistics transport equipment.
A delivery event for this piece of logistics transport equipment.
Handling instructions for the transported dangerous goods.
A linear dimension or a set of linear dimensions of this logistics packaging.
A measure of the loading length which is the length along a means of transport over which the complete width and height is needed for loading all the goods items in this supply chain consignment.
The measure of the external length required in a lane for this logistics transport means.
A consignment item loaded onto, or into, this piece of logistics transport equipment.
Dangerous goods loaded into or onto this piece of associated transport equipment.
The number of packages loaded into or onto this piece of associated transport equipment.
The loading event during which goods will be or have been loaded into or onto the means of transport used for this logistics transport movement.
Loading instructions for this piece of logistics transport equipment.
The party that loads this piece of logistics transport equipment.
A manufacturer party for this production process.
A party to be notified about this logistics transport movement.
The party that operates this piece of logistics transport equipment.
A party who owns this piece of logistics transport equipment.
A pick-up event specifying when and where this piece of logistics transport equipment will be, or has been, collected, i.e. picked-up by the carrier.
A positioning event specifying when and where this piece of logistics transport equipment will be, or has been, positioned, i.e. delivered and available for pick-up.
The number of power supply connectors for this piece of logistics transport equipment.
Quarantine instructions for this piece of logistics transport equipment.
A communication event related to this monitoring IOT device.
A logistics status reported for this cross-border regulatory procedure.
An IOT device reported communication pairing for this piece of logistics transport equipment.
An IOT device reported transport event for this piece of logistics transport equipment.
A requested route for this piece of logistics transport equipment.
A scheduled or planned route for this piece of logistics transport equipment.
A quantity of seals for this associated piece of transport equipment.
A temperature setting for this piece of associated transport equipment, such as storage temperature or operational temperature.
A result of a logistics risk analysis calculation specified for this supply chain consignment.
A transport means specified for this piece of logistics transport equipment.
A storage event for this supply chain consignment.
The party which is the buyer of the transport services for this supply chain consignment.
A number of units for this supply chain event.
The unloading event during which goods will be or have been unloaded from the means of transport used for this logistics transport movement.
Unloading instructions for this piece of logistics transport equipment.
A measure of the gross volume, normally calculated by multiplying the maximum length, width and height of this supply chain consignment item.
A measure of the gross weight (mass) of this referenced supply chain consignment which includes the weight of packaging but which excludes the weight of any transport equipment.
A measure of the net weight (mass) of this consignment which excludes the weight of packaging of this supply chain consignment and that of any transport equipment.
The measure of the tare weight (mass) of this logistics means of transport which is the weight (mass) including permanent equipment but excluding goods and loose accessories.

referencedBy.comment: A piece of logistics transport equipment, at line level, utilized for this trade delivery.
A piece of transport equipment associated with this referenced supply chain consignment item.
A piece of transport equipment associated with this referenced supply chain consignment item.
A piece of logistics transport equipment attached to this logistics means of transport.
